oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Calvin Y. Douthill claim on the State of Tennessee for Civil War damages
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Calvin Y. Douthill's claim to be reimbursed $115 for "Quarter Master Stores" taken from him by "a detachment of the 9th Indiana Cav. on their march to the front after the defeat of the Confederate Army at Nashville, Tennessee." The original is in the collections of the Lincoln County Archives.
